q1_choices <- c("The Optimal Capital Structure with Taxes refers to the best mix of debt and equity financing that fully exploits the tax advantages of debt.",
                answer="The Optimal Capital Structure with Taxes refers to the best mix of debt and equity financing that maximizes a company's market value while minimizing its cost of capital, taking into account the tax benefits of debt financing..",
                "A firm can reduce its overall WACC by increasing the amount of debt financing, and it should take on as much debt as possible as long as the debt is not risky.") 
cat(q1,longmcq(q1_choices))
